sn36.18:1.1: Then several mendicants went up to the Buddha …
sn36.18:1.3: “Mendicants, what is feeling? What’s the origin of feeling? What’s the cessation of feeling? What’s the practice that leads to the cessation of feeling?
sn36.18:1.4: And what is feeling’s gratification, drawback, and escape?”
sn36.18:1.5: “Our teachings are rooted in the Buddha. …”
sn36.18:1.9: (This should be told in full as in the previous discourse.)
